subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright signed up to be the bridge to the next winning Mets team. The Mets have staggered through five losing seasons in a row, threatening to waste the prime years of their best player.
snippet: David Wright signed up to be the bridge to the next winning Mets team. The Mets have staggered through five losing seasons in a row, threatening to waste the prime years of their best player.
